rules_text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may have Arcane Tempest become an Elemental creature with base power and toughness 3/3 and flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.
Boon {2}{U} [i](Transform this permanent and attach it to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a blue Elemental with base power and toughness 3/3 and flying.
flavor_text2: [i]Herrea spent each night visiting to the skies, wholly unprepared for the day they visited her back.[/i]
